title: Appleseed (Movie)
synopsis: Growing out of the chaos of a global war, the city of Utopia is populated by humans and bioroids (artificial humans). On the surface, everything is harmonious, but tensions lurk. Into this seemingly perfect society comes a survivor of the wars, Deunan Knute, who carries a legacy that will turn out to be of critical importance to the future of humanity.
voices: ['Kobayashi, Ai', 'Kosugi, Juurouta', 'Koyama, Mami', 'Matsuoka, Yuki', 'Fujimoto, Yuzuru', 'Koyama, Takehiro', 'Nishikawa, Ikuo', 'Yamada, Miho', 'Kaneko, Yoshiyuki']
